content:
User: The download link points to a folder, which isn't helpful for single files. I need a direct download link for the specific file to read its content.

Grok: I'm constructing a direct download link using the file ID, like https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1WKOUjkKCUUBQv7u3hlwPvTLdyTIcf1fm. Maybe this will let me download and read the file's content.
